Functions

bagel

  • bagel(center: GeoJSON.Position, innerRadius: number, outerRadius: number, diff?: number): GeoJSON.Position[]

  • Returns an array of coordinates that forms a ring-shaped region.

    Used when source accepts area of search in form of array of points forming region.

    bagel([0, 51.48], 5, 10, 0.00001) // [[0.00001, 51.50893726238034], ...]

    Parameters

    • center: GeoJSON.Position
    • innerRadius: number

      inner radius in miles

    • outerRadius: number

      outer radius in miles

    • Default value diff: number = 0.000025

      offset for inner and outer circles starting points to prevent closing of ring (some sources do not interpret input correctly with too small gap in ring)

    Returns GeoJSON.Position[]

innerSquare

  • innerSquare(center: Coordinates, radius: number): SquareCoordinates

  • Returns a square region inscribed in circle region of given radius and center coordinates.

    Used when source accepts area of search in form of square region, defined by it's boundaries coordinates.

    innerSquare({ lng: 0, lat: 51.48 }, 1)
// { north: 51.49023086722906, east: 0.016427533387747755, south: 51.46976913277095, west: -0.016427533387747755 }

    Parameters

    • center: Coordinates
    • radius: number

    Returns SquareCoordinates

neswArray

  • neswArray(square: SquareCoordinates): [number, number, number, number]

  • Converts a square region to array of it's sides.

    neswArray({ north: 51.494, east: 0.023, south: 51.465, west: -0.023 })
// [51.494, 0.023, 51.465, -0.023]

    Parameters

    • square: SquareCoordinates

    Returns [number, number, number, number]

outerSquare

  • outerSquare(center: Coordinates, radius: number): SquareCoordinates

  • Returns a square region inscribed around circle region of given radius and center coordinates.

    Used when source accepts area of search in form of square region, defined by it's boundaries coordinates.

    outerSquare({ lng: 0, lat: 51.48 }, 1)
// { north: 51.49446863119019, east: 0.023232040123605323, south: 51.46553136880983, west: -0.023232040123605323 }

    Parameters

    • center: Coordinates
    • radius: number

    Returns SquareCoordinates

proximitySort

  • proximitySort<T>(center: Coordinates): ProximitySortFunction<T>

  • Creates a function that sorts an array of items by proximity to the specified point.

    const f = proximitySort({ lat: 51.48, lng: 0 })
const values = [
  { name: 'middle', location: { lat: 51.48, lon: 3 } },
  { name: 'furthest', location: { lat: 51.48, lon: 5 } },
  { name: 'unknown' },
  { name: 'closest', location: { lat: 51.48, lon: 1 } }
]

f(values)

    returns:

    [
   { name: 'closest', location: { lat: 51.48, lon: 1 } },
   { name: 'middle', location: { lat: 51.48, lon: 3 } },
   { name: 'furthest', location: { lat: 51.48, lon: 5 } },
   { name: 'unknown' }
]

    Type parameters

    • T: ObjectWithLocation

    Parameters

    • center: Coordinates

    Returns ProximitySortFunction<T>
